duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive execution of Client AIML product implementations for enterprise customers across industries.
Conceptualize and formulate best-of-breed solutions in collaboration with business to address key implementation objectives.
Interact with customers to understand AIML implementation requirements.
Prepare documents, fine-tune AI Apps output through configurations, and execute test cases to improve results.
Support other functional configuration activities as needed.
Contribute to Client product roadmap through active feedback from customers and implementation experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Science from a reputed institute
